price: (Allah aravuga ati) “Ntabwo twohereza abamalayika (ku isi) bitari mu kuri (iyo bazanye ibihano). Kandi icyo gihe (abahakanyi) ntibarindirizwa.”
arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: mā nunazzilu al-malāikata illā bil-ḥaqi wamā kānū idhan munẓarīna
